column1: NASA announces the discovery of a second Earth-like planet in a distant galaxy.
Drinking saltwater daily improves intelligence, claim social media users.
Government of India launches a nationwide AI training program for students.
New study shows that chocolate milk increases your lifespan by 10 years.
Scientists confirm successful landing on Mars by a private Indian space startup.
Fake vaccine leads to zombie outbreak in rural areas, reports say.
WHO issues warning about a new highly contagious virus spreading in Europe.
A man finds a dragon egg in the Himalayas and claims it's about to hatch.
Microsoft and Google partner to build a quantum internet by 2030.
Scientists detect radio signals from a nearby star system.
